entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Random.NextTimeSpan #78488
  • Changed behaviour for PropertyInfo comparison between .net6 and .net7 #78487
  • .NET 7 extremely high memory usage #78481
  • Blazor C# Debugger doesn't hit C# breakpoint after calling async Javascript function #78475
  • Improve logging of JitStressRegs flags in JitDump #78474
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.TryFromHexString #78472
  • ConsoleManualTests.ReadKey_KeyChords failures #78467
  • Receive Error while trying to use: System.Management throw System.PlatformNotSupportedException: 'System.Management currently is only supported for Windows desktop applications.' #78464
    Future
  • Local test run fails to analyze HardwareIntrinsics test results #78462
  • Type load for GDV guesses in R2R code has observable behavior #78461
    Future
  • [mono][debugger] MAUI Android crashing the app and the debugger #78460
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check for anonymous authentication #78459
  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames #78458
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78457
    8.0.0
  • TarReader doesn't read paths with spaces from Pax extended attributes #78456
  • SyndicationFeed_Write_RSS_Atom test failing with "IOException : The file '/tmp/' already exists." #78454
  • Can't validate CMS signature in .NET 6/7, works in .NET 4.8 #78453
  • Improve the JavaScript interop code generators to support additional scenarios #78455
    Future
  • Performance Benchmark #78451
  • AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies() and AssemblyLoadContexts being unloaded #78449
  • Debug.Assert when using ReceiveFrom on UnixDomainSocket #78448
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize, when JsonIgnoreAttribute and "required" used together, throw exception #78443
  • .NET 8 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #78442
    8.0.0
  • `Guid(ReadOnlySpan<Byte>)` could be optimized #78440

Closed

  • .NET 7 DateTime.AddXXX undocumented behaviour changes #78452
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Collections.IterateForEach<String> #78407
  • Throw helper methods that just construct exceptions get inlined #78300
    8.0.0
  • dotnet test does not support arm64 for platform and does not pass args to the build of other projects #78325
  • Memory leak from linked cancellation token registrations #78180
  • Probable wrong codegen or stack corruption in .NET 7.0.0 #78387
  • Arithmetic overflow in code, generated by `GeneratedRegexAttribute` #78214
    7.0.x
  • [wasi] Add new RID for WASI #77780
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Review COOP helpers that may cause long GC suspension pauses. #73655
    8.0.0
  • SCrypt.ComputeDerivedKey crashes when using .NET 7 #78444
  • [MONO][Marshal] Remove unused marshal-noilgen code #78422
  • Support TLS 1.3 Early Data (0-RTT) with SslStream #49274
    Future
  • How to use the right certificate from a .NET Keystore for a .NET SSL application on linux #78369
  • Incorrect order of arguments when calling the `XmlConfigurationElementTextContent` constructor #78212
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] add support for retrying debugger tests when chrome launch times out #76528
  • Des decryption result error on .net6, It is normal in the .netfx4.5 / .net5 environment #78445
  • [tests] SyndicationFeed_Load_Write_RSS_Feed failing on Wasm with tmp/ file already exists #77526
  • [API Proposal]: Simple one-shot hashing methods that produce the relevant type #76279
    8.0.0
  • JsonPolymorphic Deserialization Fails When TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName Not First Property #78447
  • OutOfMemoryException in container that didn't have enough memory to allocate an LOH segment #77961
    8.0.0
  • Pass constants to parameters marked as [ConstantExpected] #33771
    8.0.0
  • switch expression has suboptimal codegen #78439
  • Store list of instantiated types in MIBC #78432
  • RegEx: Support for POSIX character classes #22401
    Future
  • Overload to Regex.Escape with RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace option #24322
    Future
  • RegEx, please add Pre-Defined Subroutines. #34269
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Code quality concerns #78485
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for standalone GC back compatibility #78484
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter cleanup #78482
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove unused arguments from C# test Mains #78478
    test-enhancement
  • linux-requirements.md: add missing line-continuation #78476
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #78470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.x
  • Console.Unix: don't calculate cached cursor position from the last column. #78466
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Remove invalidation of whitespace in TryGetNextExtendedAttribute #78465
    area-System.IO
  • Use a list for tests in src/tests/run.py #78463
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use helpers in Guid's ROS<byte> constructor #78446
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove some unnecessary templating in assembly binder #78441
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove some Windows specific formatters #78434
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Linker into runtime2 #78077
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Don't inline >8 bytes of IL calls in BBJ_THROW #78386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for BitOperations zero count #78391
    area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • Fixes around virtual method hierarchy validation #78157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove most *PrintToStd* functions #78437
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Disable distributed transactions test #78468
    area-System.Transactions
  • Fix single quote processing from debug output #78479
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add readme for remaining M.E.Logging libraries #78477
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm] Add link to debugger docs from WasmAppHost docs #78471
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding check on R2RDump #78343
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Address some COOP native helpers that could cause suspension pauses. #78450
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • new RID: wasi-wasm #78376
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [marshal] Cleanup dead ifdefs #78435
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Adds readme for more extension items #77865
    area-Meta
  • Fix parameters order when creating XmlConfigurationElementTextContent object #78433
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use Helix's retry mechanism to re-run debugger tests on CI if .. #78357
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use zero register in csel when possible #78330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Use compile time handle for instruction comments on xarch too #78382
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dedup Enumerable.Any with Enumerable.TryGetNonEnumeratedCount #78438
    area-System.Linq, 8.0.0
  • Add sdcardfs to filesystems list #78424
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add HashTo/GetCurrentHashAs{UInt32/64} methods #78075
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use IndexOfAny in IndexOfHtmlAttributeEncodingChars #78240
    area-System.Net
  • Fixing typo in area-owners #78429
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Extending variable live ranges in more cases #77439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Revert don't need to escape special characters anymore #78320
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    area-Infrastructure
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [wasm] Add new `runtime-wasm-features` pipeline #76822
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow interop resolvers to return self handle #78004
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reflection context tests working #77999
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Add `DllCharacteristics.ForceIntegrity` and `ControlFlowGuard`. #78072
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Put GenericTypeDefinition into genericCache to try to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix a typo. #78105
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK (WIP) #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Removing outdated unused r2rdump tests #78431
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][jit] Rework the implementation of __arglist to be platform ind… #78329
  • [release/7.0] source build backports #78395
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix DualMode ReceiveFrom on macOS #78261
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Remove hard_limit_for_bookkeeping #77480
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][wasm] Handle delegates decorated with [UnmanagedFunctionPointe… #78426
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Don't emit frozen string literals for rare code paths #78370
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve the handling of Create, CreateScalar, and CreateScalarUnsafe for vectors #78236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 to 6.0 take 2 #78247
    NO-MERGE, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
